SELECT c.name as categoryName, COALESCE(SUM(o.discount_amount), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(o.total_amount), 0) as revenue, COUNT(o.order_id) as orderCount FROM orders_m o JOIN payment_d p ON o.payments_id = p.payments_id JOIN order_item_d oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN product pr ON oi.product_id = pr.product_id JOIN category c ON pr.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.payment_status_code = '04' AND LEFT(o.order_date, 8) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y0101') AND DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY c.category_id, c.name ORDER BY revenue DESC

SELECT v.name as vendorName, COALESCE(MAX(ld.max_concurrent_viewers), 0) as maxViewers FROM vendor_m v LEFT JOIN live_m l ON v.vendor_id = l.vendor_id LEFT JOIN live_dashboard_d ld ON l.live_id = ld.live_id WHERE v.status = 'APPROVED' AND (l.start_at IS NULL OR LEFT(l.start_at, 8) BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y%m'), '01') AND DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d')) GROUP BY v.vendor_id, v.name HAVING maxViewers > 0 ORDER BY maxViewers DESC
